pr_title: [java] Fix UnusedAssignment FP with methods throwing exceptions

timeline.message: Fix UnusedAssignment FP with methods throwing exceptions

timeline.bodyText:
Theoretically, creating the reader could already throw (e.g. when using FileReader), which means, that catch & finally is directly executed, but not the try-body.
But in this example, a is always overwritten in finally, so the result doesn't change.
timeline.author: adangel
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -1240,6 +1296,68 @@ public class Foo { } ]]> + + Try/catch finally 4 + 3 + 4,6,8 + + The initializer for variable 'a' is never used (overwritten on lines 6, 8 and 10) + The value assigned to variable 'a' is never used (overwritten on line 10) + The value assigned to variable 'a' is never used (overwritten on line 10) + +

replies.bodyText: I think this should be handled.. I'll double check later
